CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 22, 1954, pg. 27, reads: "Uptown Little League Opener - A throng of some five hundred baseball fans saw the North Side Elks down the Pittsburgh Lions by a 1-0 score at Kennard Field, last Saturday, as Jack Bishop's homer decided the issue... Top right: Howard C. McKinney of Hill City throws in the first ball... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Howard C. McKinney throwing out first pitch for Pittsburgh Lions versus Northside Elks game, Uptown Little League opening day, Kennard Field
